Title: Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG preparing first LNG cargo for loading: Kosmos Energy
Description: The BP-controlled British Sponsor LNG tanker has moved alongside Gimi, the Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG unit, signalling that the BP-operated 2.5 mtpa project is ready to load its inaugural cargo.
Author: CK

Title: EU to fund gas purchases for Ukraine, boosting energy resilience
Description: The European Commission has agreed to fund gas purchases for Ukraine as part of a new support package designed to stabilize the country’s energy system and integrate it into the European energy market by 2027.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand to receive first China LNG re-export of the year in February
Description: Thailand is set to receive its first LNG re-export cargo from China this year, with the Greenergy Ocean LNG tanker expected to deliver to the PTT-operated Map Ta Phut LNG receiving terminal in Rayong on Feb. 27.
Author: CK

Title: Oman’s Sohar Port and Freezone begins dredging operations for Marsa LNG bunkering project
Description: The Sohar Port and Freezone in Oman has started dredging operations for the 1 mtpa Marsa LNG project, set to become the first LNG bunkering project in the Middle East.
Author: CK

Title: Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG yet to load first cargo; LNG tanker idles nearby
Description: The BP-operated 2.5 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG project located on the maritime border between Mauritania and Senegal has not yet shipped its first cargo, despite an announcement by Mauritania’s energy minister that this would occur on Feb. 22.
Author: CK
